mapper.select: SELECT p.name AS productName, p.image_url AS imageUrl, o.total_point AS totalPoint, o.amount AS amount, o.created_at AS orderDate FROM `orders` o JOIN products p ON o.product_id = p.id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `orders` (user_id, product_id, total_point, amount) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{totalPoint}, #{amount})
